summary: Investment Banking Summer Analyst with experience in sell-side and buy-side M&A, financial modeling, equity research, and client communications. Proven ability to build levered models, accretion/dilution analyses, and investor materials; contributed to deal processes and client interactions. Background in finance research and sales with strong Excel and programming skills.

experience.title: Investment Banking Summer Analyst
experience.description: Advised on a $1.2B sell-side M&A deal; completed buy-side M&A screen; built levered model projecting operations, financing and returns; completed multiple model iterations and sensitivities; coded Excel macros to improve client experience; communicated with clients and partner banks to create investor materials and facilitate deal processes; performed M&A screen for $20B client with 7 criteria; built accretion-dilution mini-model; reviewed equity research and 10-Ks to create profiles and growth commentary.

experience.title: Finance Research Assistant
experience.description: Analyzed SEC filings to assess target company valuations; reviewed takeover background, identifying data points to calculate takeover premiums; organized information in Excel to facilitate data analysis; reviewed final paper for topic and provided content improvements.

experience.title: Sales Clerk
experience.description: Advised customers and completed sales; increased sales earnings by 20% in the Junior's Department; named Employee of the Month for friendly and helpful service.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Aeronautical Engineering
